title: Thermodynamic Characterizations of Singular Bayesian Models: Specific Heat, Susceptibility, and Entropy Flow in Posterior Geometry
summary: Singular learning theory (SLT) \citep{watanabe2009algebraic,watanabe2018mathematical} provides a rigorous asymptotic framework for Bayesian models with non-identifiable parameterizations, yet the statistical meaning of its second-order invariant, the \emph{singular fluctuation}, has remained unclear. In this work, we show that singular fluctuation admits a precise and natural interpretation as a \emph{specific heat}: the second derivative of the Bayesian free energy with respect to temperature. Equivalently, it measures the posterior variance of the log-likelihood observable under the tempered Gibbs posterior. We further introduce a collection of related thermodynamic quantities, including entropy flow, prior susceptibility, and cross-susceptibility, that together provide a detailed geometric diagnosis of singular posterior structure. Through extensive numerical experiments spanning discrete symmetries, boundary singularities, continuous gauge freedoms, and piecewise (ReLU) models, we demonstrate that these thermodynamic signatures cleanly distinguish singularity types, exhibit stable finite-sample behavior, and reveal phase-transition--like phenomena as temperature varies. We also show empirically that the widely used WAIC estimator \citep{watanabe2010asymptotic, watanabe2013widely} is exactly twice the thermodynamic specific heat at unit temperature, clarifying its robustness in singular models.Our results establish a concrete bridge between singular learning theory and statistical mechanics, providing both theoretical insight and practical diagnostics for modern Bayesian models.

AI.tldr: 本文揭示了奇异学习理论中奇异涨落的统计力学解释：它是贝叶斯自由能对温度的二次导数，即比热。通过引入热力学量，为奇异后验结构提供几何诊断。
AI.motivation: 奇异学习理论为非可识别参数化的贝叶斯模型提供了严格的渐近框架，但其二阶不变量"奇异涨落"的统计意义一直不明确。需要澄清其统计含义并提供实用的诊断工具。
AI.method: 将奇异涨落解释为比热（贝叶斯自由能对温度的二次导数），并引入相关热力学量（熵流、先验敏感性、交叉敏感性）。通过数值实验验证，涵盖离散对称性、边界奇点、连续规范自由度和分段（ReLU）模型。
AI.result: 奇异涨落具有精确的自然解释：作为比热，测量在温度化吉布斯后验下对数似然观测量的后验方差。热力学特征能清晰区分奇点类型，展现稳定的有限样本行为，并揭示随温度变化的相变现象。WAIC估计量恰好是单位温度下热力学比热的两倍。
AI.conclusion: 研究在奇异学习理论和统计力学之间建立了具体桥梁，为现代贝叶斯模型提供了理论洞见和实用诊断工具，澄清了奇异模型中WAIC的鲁棒性。

title: Estimating axial symmetry using random projections
summary: This paper studies the problem of identifying directions of axial symmetry in multivariate distributions. Theoretical results are derived on how the measure or cardinality of the set of symmetry directions relates to spherical symmetry. The problem is framed using random projections, leading to a proof that in \(\RR^2\), agreement on two random projections is enough to identify the true axes of symmetry. A corresponding result for higher dimensions is conjectured. An estimator for the symmetry directions is proposed and proved to be consistent in the plane.

AI.tldr: 研究多元分布中轴向对称方向的识别问题，探讨对称方向集合的测度/基数与球对称的关系，使用随机投影框架证明在二维空间中两个随机投影足以识别真实对称轴，提出对称方向估计器并证明其在平面上的相合性。
AI.motivation: 研究多元分布中轴向对称方向的识别问题，旨在理解对称方向集合的性质及其与球对称分布的关系，为实际应用中识别数据对称轴提供理论基础。
AI.method: 采用随机投影框架分析问题，在二维空间中证明两个随机投影足以识别真实对称轴，提出对称方向估计器，并证明其在平面上的相合性。
AI.result: 在二维空间中，两个随机投影的匹配足以识别真实对称轴；提出了对称方向估计器并证明其在平面上的相合性；对高维情况的相应结果提出了猜想。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为识别多元分布中的轴向对称方向提供了理论框架，在二维空间中建立了完整的理论结果，为高维情况的进一步研究奠定了基础。

title: Expected star discrepancy based on stratified sampling
summary: We present two main contributions to the expected star discrepancy theory. First, we derive a sharper expected upper bound for jittered sampling, improving the leading constants and logarithmic terms compared to the state-of-the-art [Doerr, 2022]. Second, we prove the strong partition principle for star discrepancy, showing that any equal-measure stratified sampling yields a strictly smaller expected discrepancy than simple random sampling, thereby resolving an open question in [Kiderlen and Pausinger, 2022]. Numerical simulations confirm our theoretical advances and illustrate the superiority of stratified sampling in low to moderate dimensions.

AI.tldr: 本文改进了抖动采样的期望星差异上界，并证明了星差异的强分割原理，表明等测度分层采样比简单随机采样具有更小的期望差异。
AI.motivation: 星差异是衡量点集均匀性的重要指标，在数值积分和采样理论中有广泛应用。现有研究对抖动采样和分层采样的期望星差异界限仍有改进空间，且关于分层采样是否总是优于简单随机采样的问题尚未完全解决。
AI.method: 1. 推导了抖动采样的更紧致期望上界，改进了前导常数和对数项；2. 证明了星差异的强分割原理，通过理论分析表明等测度分层采样严格优于简单随机采样；3. 通过数值模拟验证理论结果。
AI.result: 1. 获得了抖动采样的改进期望上界，常数项和对数项均优于现有最佳结果；2. 证明了强分割原理，解决了Kiderlen和Pausinger（2022）提出的开放性问题；3. 数值模拟证实了分层采样在低到中等维度中的优越性。
AI.conclusion: 本文在期望星差异理论方面做出了两个重要贡献：改进了抖动采样的上界，并证明了分层采样在期望星差异意义上严格优于简单随机采样，为采样策略的选择提供了理论依据。

title: An $hp$-adaptive finite element framework for static cracks: The impact of pointwise density variations on mode I, mode II, and mixed-mode fracture
summary: A robust $hp$-adaptive finite element framework is presented for the investigation of static cracks in materials characterized by complex, pointwise density variations. Within such heterogeneous media, the equilibrium equation governed by the divergence of the stress tensor is reduced to a vector-valued quasilinear partial differential equation, wherein significant gradients and nonlinearities are introduced into the governing constitutive relations by spatial density variations. To ensure that these localized field variables are accurately captured, an automated $hp$-refinement strategy is implemented so that element sizes ($h$) and polynomial degrees ($p$) are concurrently optimized. A dual-indicator approach is employed by the framework. In this approach, $h$-refinement is driven by the Kelly error estimator, which utilizes the jump of the normal derivative across element interfaces, while $p$-refinement is determined by the decay of Legendre-Fourier coefficients to assess the local smoothness of the solution. Optimal convergence rates are ensured by this dual-refinement strategy, particularly within the singular regions surrounding the crack tip where material heterogeneities and geometric discontinuities intersect. The performance of the proposed method is rigorously evaluated across three distinct loading regimes: pure tensile (Mode I), pure shear (Mode II), and mixed-mode loading. It is demonstrated through numerical simulations that the intricate interaction between the fracture process zone and the underlying material heterogeneities is effectively resolved by the $hp$-adaptive scheme. Furthermore, the influence of specific density-dependent constitutive relations on the resulting crack-tip stress fields and strain energy density distributions is analyzed in detail.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种用于研究具有复杂点密度变化材料中静态裂纹的鲁棒hp-自适应有限元框架，通过双指标策略同时优化网格尺寸和多项式阶数，在裂纹尖端奇异区域实现最优收敛率。
AI.motivation: 研究具有复杂点密度变化的异质材料中的静态裂纹问题，这些材料中的空间密度变化会在本构关系中引入显著梯度和非线性，需要精确捕捉局部场变量。
AI.method: 采用hp-自适应有限元框架，其中h-细化由Kelly误差估计器驱动（基于单元界面法向导数跳跃），p-细化由Legendre-Fourier系数衰减确定（评估局部解的光滑性）。框架采用双指标策略同时优化网格尺寸和多项式阶数。
AI.result: 该方法在纯拉伸（模式I）、纯剪切（模式II）和混合模式加载三种不同载荷工况下进行了严格评估。数值模拟表明，hp-自适应方案能有效解析断裂过程区与底层材料异质性之间的复杂相互作用，并详细分析了特定密度相关本构关系对裂纹尖端应力场和应变能密度分布的影响。
AI.conclusion: 提出的hp-自适应有限元框架能够准确捕捉异质材料中裂纹尖端附近的局部场变量，在材料异质性和几何不连续性相交的奇异区域实现最优收敛率，为研究复杂密度变化材料中的裂纹行为提供了有效工具。

title: Sharpness of the percolation phase transition for weighted random connection models
summary: We establish the sharpness of the percolation phase transition for a class of infinite-range weighted random connection models. The vertex set is given by a marked Poisson point process on $\mathbb{R}^d$ with intensity $λ>0$, where each vertex carries an independent weight. Pairs of vertices are then connected independently with a probability that depends on both their spatial displacement and their respective weights. It is well known that such models undergo a phase transition in $λ$ with respect to the existence of an infinite cluster (under suitable assumptions on the connection probabilities and the weight distribution). We prove that in the subcritical regime the cluster-size distribution has exponentially decaying tails, whereas in the supercritical regime the percolation probability grows at least linearly with respect to $λ$ near criticality. Our proof follows the approach of Duminil-Copin, Raoufi, and Tassion, applying the OSSS inequality to a finite-lattice approximation of the continuum model in order to derive a new differential inequality, which we then analyze and pass to the limit. In addition to the classical random connection model, we consider weighted models with unbounded weights satisfying the min-reach condition under which the neighborhood of each vertex is deterministically bounded by a radius depending solely on its weight. Notably, finite range is not assumed -- that is, we allow unbounded edge lengths -- but the weight distribution is required to satisfy appropriate moment conditions. We expect that our method extends to a broad class of weighted random connection models.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了无限范围加权随机连接模型的渗流相变是尖锐的，在亚临界区域簇大小分布呈指数衰减，在超临界区域渗流概率在临界点附近随强度参数λ至少线性增长。
AI.motivation: 研究无限范围加权随机连接模型的渗流相变性质，这类模型在顶点间连接概率同时依赖于空间距离和顶点权重，需要理解其相变行为的尖锐性。
AI.method: 采用Duminil-Copin、Raoufi和Tassion的方法，将OSSS不等式应用于连续模型的有限格点逼近，推导新的微分不等式，然后分析并取极限。
AI.result: 证明了在亚临界区域簇大小分布具有指数衰减尾部，在超临界区域渗流概率在临界点附近随λ至少线性增长，相变是尖锐的。
AI.conclusion: 该方法适用于广泛的加权随机连接模型，包括满足最小可达条件且权重分布满足适当矩条件的无界权重模型，不要求有限范围（允许无界边长度）。

title: Novel Perturbed b-Metric and Perturbed Extended b-Metric Spaces with Banach-Type Fixed Point Theorem
summary:
In this paper, we introduce a new general framework, called \emph{perturbed extended $b$-metric spaces}, denoted by $(X,\mathcal{D}_ζ,\hbar)$, which extends the classical and extended $b$-metric structures through the inclusion of an explicit perturbation mapping $\hbar$. This formulation is motivated by the observation that distance measurements in many analytical and applied contexts are often affected by intrinsic or external deviations that cannot be captured by the usual metric-type geometries. We also identify a meaningful specialization arising when the control function $ζ$ is constant, leading to the notion of a \emph{perturbed $b$-metric space}, introduced here as a natural restriction of the general framework.
  We establish several fundamental properties of spaces of the form $(X,\mathcal{D}_ζ,\hbar)$ and develop a Banach-type fixed point theorem in the perturbed extended $b$-metric setting. Conditions ensuring the existence and uniqueness of fixed points of a self-map $T:X\to X$ are derived, together with convergence of Picard iterations $T^{n}v \to \vartheta$. Illustrative examples are provided to show that the presence of the perturbation term $\hbar$, together with the influence of the control function $ζ$, may cause $\mathcal{D}_ζ$ to lose the usual extended $b$-metric behaviour and prevent $\mathcal{D}_ζ$ from satisfying the standard extended $b$-metric axioms. We further discuss natural extensions of this perturbation philosophy to multi-point settings, encompassing $S$-metric spaces and their extended and $S_b$-metric variants. The results presented here open new directions for the study of contractive operators and fixed point theory in generalized metric environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了扰动扩展b-度量空间的新框架，通过引入显式扰动映射ℏ扩展了经典和扩展b-度量结构，建立了Banach型不动点定理，并讨论了向多点和S-度量空间的推广。
AI.motivation: 许多分析和应用场景中的距离测量常受到内在或外部偏差的影响，这些偏差无法被通常的度量型几何结构所捕捉，因此需要引入扰动项来更准确地描述实际距离关系。
AI.method: 引入扰动扩展b-度量空间(X,𝒟_ζ,ℏ)框架，包含控制函数ζ和扰动映射ℏ；建立该空间的基本性质，推导Banach型不动点定理；提供示例说明扰动项如何改变度量行为；讨论向多点和S-度量空间的扩展。
AI.result: 建立了扰动扩展b-度量空间的基本理论框架，证明了存在性和唯一性条件，展示了扰动项ℏ和控制函数ζ可能导致𝒟_ζ失去标准扩展b-度量性质，为广义度量环境中的压缩算子和不动点理论研究开辟了新方向。
AI.conclusion: 提出的扰动扩展b-度量空间框架成功扩展了经典度量结构，能够更好地描述实际应用中的距离偏差，建立的Banach型不动点定理为相关算子研究提供了理论基础，该框架可进一步推广到多点和S-度量空间等更广泛场景。

title: Laguerre- and Laplace-weighted integration of mixed-smoothness functions
summary: We investigate the approximation of generalized Laguerre- or Laplace-weighted integrals over $\mathbb{R}^d_+$ or $\mathbb{R}^d$ of functions from generalized Laguerre- or Laplace-weighted Sobolev spaces of mixed smoothness, respectively. We prove upper and lower bounds of the convergence rate of optimal quadratures with respect to $n$ integration nodes for functions from these spaces. The upper bound is performed by sparse-grid quadratures with integration nodes on step hyperbolic corners or hyperbolic crosses in the function domain $\mathbb{R}^d_+$ or $\mathbb{R}^d$, respectively.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了广义拉盖尔或拉普拉斯加权积分在混合光滑度加权Sobolev空间中的近似问题，证明了最优求积公式收敛速度的上下界，上界通过稀疏网格求积实现
AI.motivation: 研究在广义拉盖尔或拉普拉斯加权Sobolev空间中，对高维积分进行数值近时的最优收敛速度，为高维加权积分计算提供理论保证
AI.method: 使用稀疏网格求积方法，在函数定义域上采用阶梯双曲角或双曲交叉节点配置，分析其在混合光滑度加权Sobolev空间中的收敛性能
AI.result: 证明了最优求积公式收敛速度的上下界，上界通过稀疏网格求积实现，下界通过理论分析得到，为高维加权积分计算提供了理论依据
AI.conclusion: 稀疏网格求积方法在广义拉盖尔或拉普拉斯加权Sobolev空间的积分近似中可以达到最优收敛速度，为解决高维加权积分计算问题提供了有效工具

title: Repeat times and a two-weight UST model
summary: We study a model of random weighted uniform spanning trees on the complete graph with $n$ vertices, where each edge is assigned a weight of $n^{1+γ}$ with probability $1/n$ and $1$ otherwise. Whenever $γ$ is large enough, we prove that the diameter of the resulting tree is typically of order $n^{1/3} \log n$, up to a $\log \log n$ correction. Our approach uses estimates on repeat times for selecting components in a critical Erdős-Rényi graph, as well as concentration bounds on the sums of diameters of these components.

AI.tldr: 研究完全图上随机加权均匀生成树模型，当边权重为n^{1+γ}的概率为1/n，否则为1时，证明当γ足够大时，树的直径通常为n^{1/3} log n量级（含log log n修正）
AI.motivation: 研究随机加权均匀生成树的几何性质，特别是直径的渐近行为。在完全图上构建具有两种权重的随机加权生成树模型，探索权重分布如何影响树的结构特征。
AI.method: 使用临界Erdős-Rényi图中选择分量的重复时间估计，以及这些分量直径和的集中界限。通过分析随机加权生成树的构造过程，结合概率图论方法推导直径的渐近阶。
AI.result: 当γ足够大时，证明随机加权均匀生成树的直径通常为n^{1/3} log n量级，包含log log n的修正项。建立了权重分布与树直径之间的定量关系。
AI.conclusion: 在特定权重分布下，随机加权均匀生成树的直径具有n^{1/3} log n的典型阶，揭示了权重异质性对树结构几何特征的影响。

title: A stochastic optimization algorithm for revenue maximization in a service system with balking customers
summary: This paper analyzes a service system modeled as a single-server queue, in which the service provider aims to dynamically maximize the expected revenue per unit of time. This is achieved by constructing a stochastic gradient descent algorithm that dynamically adjusts the price. A key feature of our modeling framework is that customers may choose to balk - that is, decide not to join - when facing high congestion. A notable strength of our approach is that the revenue-maximizing algorithm relies solely on information about effective arrivals, meaning that only the behavior of customers who choose not to balk is observable and used in decision-making. This results in an elaborate interplay between the pricing policy and the effective arrival process, yielding a non-standard state dependent queueing process. An important contribution of our work concerns a novel Infinitesimal Perturbation Analysis (IPA) procedure that is able to consistently estimate the stationary effective arrival rate. This is further leveraged to construct an iterative algorithm that converges, under mild regularity conditions, to the optimal price with provable asymptotic guarantees.

AI.tldr: 论文研究单服务器排队系统中的动态定价优化问题，通过随机梯度下降算法调整价格以最大化单位时间期望收益，考虑顾客在高拥堵时可能放弃排队的情况。
AI.motivation: 研究服务系统中如何通过动态定价最大化单位时间期望收益，特别关注顾客在面对高拥堵时可能选择放弃排队（balk）的行为，这在实际服务系统中很常见但增加了优化复杂性。
AI.method: 构建随机梯度下降算法动态调整价格，开发新颖的无穷小扰动分析（IPA）程序来一致估计稳态有效到达率，并基于此构建迭代算法收敛到最优价格。
AI.result: 算法仅依赖有效到达信息（即实际加入排队的顾客行为），在温和正则条件下收敛到最优价格，并提供可证明的渐近保证。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提出了一种有效的动态定价方法，能够处理顾客放弃排队的情况，通过IPA技术估计稳态有效到达率，为服务系统收益最大化提供了理论保证和实用算法。

title: Optimal Robust Bounded Bias and Bounded Variance Designs
summary: Designs which are minimax in the presence of model misspecifications have been constructed so as to minimize the maximum, over classes of alternate response models, of the integrated mean squared error of the predicted values. This mean squared error decomposes into a term arising solely from variation, and a bias term arising from the model errors. Here we consider two associated problems: (i) design so as to minimize the variance, subject to a bound on the bias, and (ii) design so as to minimize the bias, subject to a bound on the variance. We show that solutions to both problems are given by the minimax designs, with appropriately chosen values of their tuning constant. Conversely, any minimax design solves both problems for appropriate choices of the bounds on the bias or variance.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了在模型误设情况下的两种设计优化问题：在偏差约束下最小化方差，以及在方差约束下最小化偏差，证明了这两种问题的解都可以通过适当选择调优常数的极小极大设计得到。
AI.motivation: 在存在模型误设的情况下，传统的极小极大设计通过最小化预测值的最大均方误差来构建。均方误差可以分解为方差项和偏差项。本文旨在探讨两个相关问题：如何在偏差约束下最小化方差，以及在方差约束下最小化偏差。
AI.method: 通过理论分析证明，这两个问题的解都可以通过适当选择调优常数的极小极大设计得到。反之，任何极小极大设计都可以通过适当选择偏差或方差约束来解决这两个问题。
AI.result: 证明了在模型误设情况下，极小极大设计不仅是最小化最大均方误差的解决方案，同时也是在偏差约束下最小化方差和在方差约束下最小化偏差的解决方案。
AI.conclusion: 极小极大设计具有双重优化特性：它既解决了最小化最大均方误差的问题，也解决了在偏差和方差约束下的优化问题，为模型误设情况下的实验设计提供了统一的框架。

title: A stabilized virtual element framework for the steady state Boussinesq equation with temperature-dependent parameters
summary: This work presents a new conforming stabilized virtual element method for the generalized Boussinesq equation with temperature-dependent viscosity and thermal conductivity. A gradient-based local projection stabilization method is introduced in the discrete formulation to circumvent the violation of the discrete inf-sup condition. The well-posedness of the continuous problem is established under sufficiently small datum. We derive a stabilized virtual element problem for the Boussinesq equation using equal-order virtual element approximations. The proposed method has several advantages, such as being more straightforward to implement, free from higher-order derivative terms, providing separate stabilization terms without introducing coupling between solution components, and minimizing the number of globally coupled degrees of freedom. The existence of a discrete solution to the stabilized virtual element problem is demonstrated using the Brouwer fixed-point theorem. The error estimates are derived in the energy norm. Additionally, several numerical examples are presented to show the efficiency and robustness of the proposed method, confirming the theoretical results.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种新的稳定化虚拟元方法，用于求解具有温度依赖粘度和热导率的广义Boussinesq方程，采用梯度局部投影稳定化技术，使用等阶虚拟元近似，具有实现简单、无需高阶导数项等优点。
AI.motivation: 针对广义Boussinesq方程（温度依赖粘度和热导率）的数值求解，需要克服离散inf-sup条件违反的问题，同时希望开发一种实现简单、计算效率高的稳定化方法。
AI.method: 提出了一种基于梯度局部投影的稳定化虚拟元方法，使用等阶虚拟元近似，引入分离的稳定化项而不引入解分量之间的耦合，最小化全局耦合自由度数量。
AI.result: 证明了连续问题在小数据条件下的适定性，使用Brouwer不动点定理证明了离散解的存在性，推导了能量范数下的误差估计，数值算例验证了方法的效率和鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功解决了广义Boussinesq方程的稳定化问题，具有实现简单、计算高效等优点，理论分析和数值实验均验证了方法的有效性。

title: Convergence Analysis of Natural Power Method and Its Applications to Control
summary: This paper analyzes the discrete-time natural power method, demonstrating its convergence to the dominant $r$-dimensional subspace corresponding to the $r$ eigenvalues with the largest absolute values. This contrasts with the Oja flow, which targets eigenvalues with the largest real parts. We leverage this property to develop methods for model order reduction and low-rank controller synthesis for discrete-time LTI systems, proving preservation of key system properties. We also extend the low-rank control framework to slowly-varying LTV systems, showing its utility for tracking time-varying dominant subspaces.

AI.tldr: 论文分析了离散时间自然幂方法的收敛性，证明其收敛到对应最大绝对值的r个特征值的r维主特征子空间，这与Oja流针对最大实部特征值不同。基于此开发了离散时间LTI系统的模型降阶和低秩控制器综合方法，并扩展到慢变LTV系统。
AI.motivation: 研究离散时间自然幂方法的收敛特性，利用其收敛到最大绝对值特征值对应子空间的特性，为离散时间线性时不变系统的模型降阶和低秩控制器综合提供理论基础，并扩展到时变系统。
AI.method: 分析离散时间自然幂方法的收敛性，证明其收敛到对应最大绝对值的r个特征值的r维主特征子空间。基于此特性开发模型降阶和低秩控制器综合方法，并扩展到慢变线性时变系统。
AI.result: 证明了离散时间自然幂方法收敛到最大绝对值特征值对应的r维子空间，与Oja流针对最大实部特征值不同。开发了保持关键系统特性的模型降阶和低秩控制器综合方法，并成功扩展到慢变LTV系统用于跟踪时变主特征子空间。
AI.conclusion: 离散时间自然幂方法收敛到最大绝对值特征值对应的主特征子空间，这为离散时间LTI系统的模型降阶和低秩控制器综合提供了有效工具，并可扩展到慢变LTV系统用于跟踪时变主特征子空间。

title: A Sieve-based Estimator for Entropic Optimal Transport
summary: The entropically regularized optimal transport problem between probability measures on compact Euclidean subsets can be represented as an information projection with moment inequality constraints. This allows its Fenchel dual to be approximated by a sequence of convex, finite-dimensional problems using sieve methods, enabling tractable estimation of the primal value and dual optimizers from samples. Assuming only continuity of the cost function, I establish almost sure consistency of these estimators. I derive a finite-sample convergence rate for the primal value estimator, showing logarithmic dependence on sieve complexity, and quantify uncertainty for the dual optimal value estimator via matching stochastic bounds involving suprema of centered Gaussian processes. These results provide the first statistical guarantees for sieve-based estimators of entropic optimal transport, extending beyond the empirical Sinkhorn approach.

AI.tldr: 论文提出基于筛法的熵正则化最优运输问题统计估计方法，建立了估计量的一致性和收敛速率
AI.motivation: 熵正则化最优运输在紧凑欧几里得子集上的概率测度间问题可以表示为具有矩不等式约束的信息投影。这使其Fenchel对偶可以通过筛法用凸有限维问题序列逼近，从而从样本中进行可处理的估计。
AI.method: 将熵正则化最优运输表示为信息投影问题，使用筛法将其Fenchel对偶近似为凸有限维问题序列，构建对偶优化器和原始值的估计量。
AI.result: 在仅假设成本函数连续的情况下，建立了估计量的几乎必然一致性；推导了原始值估计量的有限样本收敛速率（显示对筛复杂度的对数依赖）；通过涉及中心高斯过程上确界的匹配随机界限量化了对偶最优值估计量的不确定性。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果为基于筛法的熵最优运输估计量提供了首个统计保证，超越了经验Sinkhorn方法。

title: Regularity analysis and verification of Coons volume mappings
summary: The Coons volume provides a classical approach for constructing three-dimensional parametric mappings via boundary surface interpolation and is widely employed in volumetric mesh generation, computer-aided geometric design, and isogeometric analysis. However, due to curvature variations and continuity limitations of the boundary surfaces, the Jacobian determinant of a Coons volume may locally vanish or become negative, resulting in a non-regular mapping. This undermines mesh quality and compromises the stability of subsequent numerical computations. Ensuring the regularity of Coons volumes is therefore critical for robust parametric modeling. This paper develops a systematic framework for analyzing and verifying the regularity of Coons volumes. We first derive a general sufficient condition applicable to arbitrary boundary parameterizations, independent of specific analytical forms. For Bézier-form Coons volumes, we introduce a criterion based on the Bézier coefficients of the Jacobian determinant, transforming the verification problem into checking the positivity of control coefficients. Furthermore, we construct a necessary condition by applying a subdivision strategy combined with the Bézier blossoming technique, ensuring that regularity is preserved in all subdomains. By integrating these conditions, we design an efficient verification algorithm whose correctness and computational performance are validated through numerical experiments. We observe that the regularity of a Coons volume is closely related to the geometric similarity of its opposite boundary surfaces. Moreover, through Bézier extraction, the algorithm is extended to multi-patch B-spline volumes of arbitrary topology. Numerical tests show that the method completes regularity verification in milliseconds, enabling real-time application.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一个系统框架来分析和验证Coons体积的正则性，通过推导通用充分条件、基于Bézier系数的准则以及结合细分策略的必要条件，设计出高效的验证算法，可在毫秒级完成验证并扩展到多片B样条体积。
AI.motivation: Coons体积在三维参数映射构造中广泛应用，但由于边界曲面曲率变化和连续性限制，其雅可比行列式可能局部消失或变为负值，导致非正则映射，影响网格质量和后续数值计算的稳定性。因此，确保Coons体积的正则性对稳健的参数建模至关重要。
AI.method: 1. 推导适用于任意边界参数化的通用充分条件；2. 针对Bézier形式的Coons体积，提出基于雅可比行列式Bézier系数的准则，将验证问题转化为检查控制系数的正性；3. 通过结合细分策略和Bézier开花技术构造必要条件，确保所有子域中正则性得以保持；4. 整合这些条件设计高效验证算法；5. 通过Bézier提取将算法扩展到任意拓扑的多片B样条体积。
AI.result: 数值实验验证了算法的正确性和计算性能，发现Coons体积的正则性与其相对边界曲面的几何相似性密切相关。算法可在毫秒级完成正则性验证，支持实时应用，并能成功扩展到多片B样条体积。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的系统框架能够有效分析和验证Coons体积的正则性，通过结合充分条件、基于Bézier系数的准则和细分策略的必要条件，实现了高效可靠的验证算法，为三维参数建模的稳健性提供了重要保障，并具有扩展到更复杂几何结构的潜力。

title: Dynamic Data Pricing: A Mean Field Stackelberg Game Approach
summary: This paper studies the dynamic pricing mechanism for data products in demand-driven markets through a game-theoretic framework. We develop a three-tier Stackelberg game model to capture the hierarchical strategic interactions among key market entities: a single data buyer, an intermediary broker, and a competitive seller group. To characterize the temporal dynamics of data quality evolution, we establish a coupled system of stochastic differential equations (SDEs) where sellers' quality investments interact through mean field effects. Given exogenous pricing policies, we derive approximate Nash equilibrium adjustment strategies for competitive sellers using the mean field game (MFG) approach. The broker's optimal pricing strategy is subsequently established by solving a Stackelberg leadership problem, while the buyer's procurement policy is determined through an optimal control formulation involving conditional mean field forward-backward SDEs (FBSDEs). Under some regularity conditions, the proposed strategies are shown to collectively form an $(ε_1,ε_2,ε_3)$-Stackelberg equilibrium.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过博弈论框架研究需求驱动市场中数据产品的动态定价机制，建立了包含数据买家、中介经纪人和竞争性卖家群体的三层Stackelberg博弈模型，并采用平均场博弈方法分析均衡策略。
AI.motivation: 研究需求驱动市场中数据产品的动态定价问题，需要处理市场实体间的层级战略互动以及数据质量随时间的演化动态，现有研究缺乏对此类复杂交互的系统分析框架。
AI.method: 建立三层Stackelberg博弈模型：买家-经纪人-卖家群体；使用随机微分方程描述数据质量演化的时间动态；采用平均场博弈方法推导竞争性卖家的近似纳什均衡调整策略；通过Stackelberg领导问题确定经纪人最优定价策略；使用条件平均场前向-后向随机微分方程确定买家采购策略。
AI.result: 在给定外生定价政策下，推导出竞争性卖家的近似纳什均衡调整策略；建立了经纪人的最优定价策略和买家的最优采购策略；在一定的正则条件下，这些策略共同构成了$(ε_1,ε_2,ε_3)$-Stackelberg均衡。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提出了一个完整的博弈论框架来分析数据产品市场的动态定价机制，通过平均场博弈和Stackelberg均衡的有机结合，为理解复杂市场结构中的战略互动提供了理论工具，并证明了均衡解的存在性和近似最优性。

title: Factorized sparse approximate inverse preconditioning for singular M-matrices
summary: Here we consider the factorized sparse approximate inverse (FSAI) preconditioner. We apply the FSAI preconditioner to singular irreducible M-matrices. These matrices arise e.g. in discrete Markov chain modeling or as graph Laplacians. We show, that there are some restrictions on the nonzero pattern needed for a stable construction of the FSAI preconditioner in this case. With these restrictions FSAI is well-defined. Moreover, we proved that the FSAI preconditioner shares some important properties with the original system. The lower triangular matrix $L_G$ and the upper triangular matrix $U_G$, generated by FSAI, are non-singular and non-negative. The diagonal entries of $L_GAU_G$ are positive and $L_GAU_G$, the preconditioned matrix, is a singular M-matrix. Even more, we establish that a (1,2)-inverse is computed for the complete nonzero patter.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了因子化稀疏近似逆（FSAI）预条件子在奇异不可约M-矩阵上的应用，证明了在特定非零模式限制下FSAI的稳定构造，并展示了预条件矩阵保持了原系统的重要性质。
AI.motivation: 奇异不可约M-矩阵在离散马尔可夫链建模和图拉普拉斯矩阵等应用中广泛出现，需要有效的预条件技术来加速求解。FSAI预条件子在这类矩阵上的理论性质尚未完全明确，需要研究其稳定构造条件和数学性质。
AI.method: 将FSAI预条件子应用于奇异不可约M-矩阵，分析非零模式对稳定构造的限制条件，证明在这些限制下FSAI的良好定义性，并推导预条件矩阵的数学性质。
AI.result: 证明了在特定非零模式限制下FSAI预条件子能够稳定构造；生成的三角矩阵L_G和U_G非奇异且非负；预条件矩阵L_GAU_G的对角元为正且为奇异M-矩阵；对于完整非零模式计算了(1,2)-逆。
AI.conclusion: FSAI预条件子可以成功应用于奇异不可约M-矩阵，在适当的非零模式限制下保持稳定构造，并且预条件矩阵继承了原系统的重要数学性质，为这类矩阵的高效求解提供了理论保证。

title: A Mathematical Model to Predict Growth and Treatment for UPS Cancer
summary: We study how a fast-growing cancer Undifferentiated Pleomorphic Sarcoma (UPS) grows and how well treatments work. We create a set of equations to describe the tumor's life. We look at four main things: how surgery removes the mass, how the body heals after surgery, the best time to give radiation using on-off rules, and how the immune system fights the cancer. We checked our results against real data, and they match very well. This work helps us predict how a patient will do after treatment.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过数学模型分析未分化多形性肉瘤的生长规律和治疗效果，重点关注手术切除、术后愈合、放疗时机优化和免疫系统作用
AI.motivation: 研究快速生长的未分化多形性肉瘤的生长机制和治疗效果，为临床治疗提供理论依据和预测工具
AI.method: 建立描述肿瘤生命周期的方程组，分析四个关键因素：手术切除质量、术后愈合过程、基于开关规则的放疗最佳时机、免疫系统对抗肿瘤的作用
AI.result: 模型结果与真实数据高度吻合，验证了数学模型的准确性
AI.conclusion: 该研究为预测患者治疗后预后提供了有效的数学工具，有助于优化临床治疗方案

title: Optimal-Transport Stability of Inverse Point-Source Problems for Elliptic and Parabolic Equations
summary: We establish quantitative global stability estimates, formulated in terms of optimal transport (OT) cost, for inverse point-source problems governed by elliptic and parabolic equations with spatially varying coefficients. The key idea is that the Kantorovich dual potential can be represented as a boundary functional of suitable adjoint solutions, thereby linking OT geometry with boundary observations. In the elliptic case, we construct complex geometric optics solutions that enforce prescribed pointwise constraints, whereas in the parabolic case we employ controllable adjoint solutions that transfer interior information to the boundary. Under mild regularity and separation assumptions, we obtain estimates of the form \[ \mathcal{T}_c(μ,ν) \le C\,\|u_1 - u_2\|_{L^2(\partialΩ)} \quad \text{and} \quad \mathcal{T}_c(μ,ν) \le C\,\|u_1 - u_2\|_{L^2(\partialΩ\times[0,T])}, \] where $μ$ and $ν$ are admissible point-source measures. These results provide a unified analytical framework connecting inverse source problems and optimal transport, and establish OT-based stability theory for inverse source problems governed by partial differential equations with spatially varying coefficients.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了基于最优传输成本的逆点源问题全局稳定性估计，将Kantorovich对偶势表示为边界泛函，连接了OT几何与边界观测
AI.motivation: 为具有空间变化系数的椭圆和抛物型方程控制的逆点源问题建立定量全局稳定性估计，连接逆源问题与最优传输理论
AI.method: 将Kantorovich对偶势表示为边界泛函，椭圆情形构造复几何光学解施加点约束，抛物情形使用可控伴随解将内部信息传递到边界
AI.result: 在温和正则性和分离假设下，获得形式为𝒯_c(μ,ν) ≤ C‖u₁-u₂‖_{L²(∂Ω)}和𝒯_c(μ,ν) ≤ C‖u₁-u₂‖_{L²(∂Ω×[0,T])}的估计
AI.conclusion: 建立连接逆源问题与最优传输的统一分析框架，为具有空间变化系数的偏微分方程逆源问题建立基于OT的稳定性理论

title: Jointly Optimal Policies for Remote Estimation of Autoregressive Markov Processes over Time-Correlated Fading Channel
summary: We study a remote estimation setup with an autoregressive (AR) Markov process, a sensor, and a remote estimator. The sensor observes the process and sends encoded observations to the estimator as packets over an unreliable communication channel modeled as the Gilbert-Elliot (GE) channel. We assume that the sensor gets to observe the channel state by the ACK/NACK feedback mechanism only when it attempts a transmission while it does not observe the channel state when no transmission attempt is made. The objective is to design a transmission scheduling strategy for the sensor, and an estimation strategy for the estimator that are jointly optimal, i.e., they minimize the expected value of an infinite-horizon cumulative discounted cost defined as the sum of squared estimation error over time and the sensor's transmission power. Since the sensor and the estimator have access to different information sets, this constitutes a decentralized stochastic control problem. We formulate this problem as a partially observed Markov decision process (POMDP) and show the existence of jointly optimal transmission and estimation strategies that have a simple structure. More specifically, an optimal transmission strategy exhibits a threshold structure, i.e., the sensor attempts a transmission only when its belief about the channel being in a good state exceeds a threshold that depends on a certain error. Moreover, an optimal estimation strategy follows a `Kalman-like' update rule. When the channel parameters are unknown, we exploit this structure to design an actor-critic reinforcement learning algorithm that converges to a locally optimal policy. Simulations show the learned policy performs close to a globally optimal one, with about a 5.5% average relative gap across evaluated parameters.

AI.tldr: 研究远程估计系统中传感器的最优传输调度和估计器的最优估计策略，考虑AR马尔可夫过程和不可靠的Gilbert-Elliot信道，通过POMDP建模证明存在具有简单结构的联合最优策略。
AI.motivation: 在远程估计系统中，传感器和估计器具有不同的信息集，传感器只能通过传输尝试获得信道状态反馈，这构成了一个分散式随机控制问题。需要设计联合最优的传输调度和估计策略来最小化估计误差和传输功耗的累积成本。
AI.method: 将问题建模为部分可观测马尔可夫决策过程(POMDP)，证明存在具有简单结构的联合最优策略：传输策略具有阈值结构，估计策略遵循类卡尔曼更新规则。当信道参数未知时，利用该结构设计演员-评论家强化学习算法。
AI.result: 证明了最优传输策略具有阈值结构，即只有当传感器对信道处于良好状态的信念超过某个依赖于特定误差的阈值时才尝试传输。最优估计策略遵循类卡尔曼更新规则。学习到的策略与全局最优策略性能接近，平均相对差距约为5.5%。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为具有不可靠通信信道的远程估计系统提供了理论框架和实用算法，证明了简单结构最优策略的存在性，并设计了有效的强化学习算法来处理未知信道参数的情况。

title: Weighted $L_p$-Discrepancy Bounds for Parametric Stratified Sampling and Applications to High-Dimensional Integration
summary: This paper studies the expected $L_p$-discrepancy ($2 \leq p < \infty$) for stratified sampling schemes under importance sampling. We introduce a parametric family of equivolume partitions $Ω_{θ,\sim}$ and leverage recent exact formulas for the expected $L_2$-discrepancy \cite{xian2025improved}. Our main contribution is a weighted discrepancy reduction lemma that relates weighted $L_p$-discrepancy to standard $L_p$-discrepancy with explicit constants depending on the weight function. For $p=2$, we obtain explicit bounds using the exact discrepancy formulas. For $p>2$, we derive probabilistic bounds via dyadic chaining techniques. The results yield uniform error estimates for multivariate integration in Sobolev spaces $\mathcal{H}^1(K)$ and $F^*_{d,q}$, demonstrating improved performance over classical jittered sampling in importance sampling scenarios. Numerical experiments validate our theoretical findings and illustrate the practical advantages of parametric stratified sampling.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了重要性采样下分层抽样方案的期望L_p-差异（2≤p<∞），引入了等体积划分的参数族，并利用L_2-差异的精确公式，通过加权差异约简引理和概率边界推导，获得了优于经典抖动抽样的性能。
AI.motivation: 研究重要性采样场景下分层抽样方案的期望L_p-差异，旨在改进经典抖动抽样在重要性采样中的性能，为多元积分提供更优的误差估计。
AI.method: 引入参数化的等体积划分族Ω_{θ,∼}，利用L_2-差异的精确公式，提出加权差异约简引理将加权L_p-差异与标准L_p-差异关联，对p=2使用显式边界，对p>2使用二进链技术的概率边界。
AI.result: 获得了Sobolev空间𝒢^1(K)和F^*_{d,q}中多元积分的均匀误差估计，证明了参数化分层抽样在重要性采样场景中优于经典抖动抽样，数值实验验证了理论结果。
AI.conclusion: 参数化分层抽样方案在重要性采样中能有效降低期望L_p-差异，为多元积分提供改进的误差估计，具有理论和实践优势。

title: Sequential Decision-making for Ride-hailing Fleet Control: A Unifying Perspective
summary: This paper provides a unified framework for the problem of controlling a fleet of ride-hailing vehicles under stochastic demand. We introduce a sequential decision-making model that consolidates several problem characteristics and can be easily extended to include additional characteristics. To solve the problem, we design an efficient procedure for enumerating all feasible vehicle-to-request assignments, and we introduce scalable techniques to deal with the exploration-exploitation tradeoff. We construct reusable benchmark instances that are based on real-world data and that capture a range of spatial structures and demand distributions. Our proposed modelling framework, policies and benchmark instances allow us to analyze interactions between problem characteristics that were not previously studied. We find no significant difference between revenue generated by internal combustion engine fleets and fast-charging electric fleets, but both significantly outperform slow-charging electric fleets. We also find that pooling increases the revenue, and reduces revenue variability, for all fleet types. Our contributions can help coordinate the significant research effort that this problem continues to receive.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个统一的框架来解决随机需求下网约车车队控制问题，设计了高效的车辆-请求分配枚举算法，并构建了基于真实数据的基准实例，发现快速充电电动车队与燃油车队收益无显著差异，但都显著优于慢充电动车队，拼车能提高所有车队类型的收益并降低收益波动。
AI.motivation: 网约车车队控制问题在随机需求下具有复杂性，现有研究缺乏统一框架来处理多种问题特征，需要开发可扩展的解决方案来协调该领域的研究工作。
AI.method: 提出序列决策模型，设计高效的车辆-请求分配枚举程序，引入可扩展的探索-利用权衡技术，构建基于真实数据的可重用基准实例，涵盖不同空间结构和需求分布。
AI.result: 燃油车队与快速充电电动车队的收益无显著差异，但两者都显著优于慢速充电电动车队；拼车能提高所有车队类型的收益并降低收益波动；模型框架和政策有助于分析先前未研究的问题特征间相互作用。
AI.conclusion: 本文的统一建模框架、策略和基准实例为网约车车队控制问题提供了系统解决方案，有助于协调该领域的研究工作，并为车队运营决策提供实证依据。

title: Non-polynomial divided difference and blossoming
summary: Two notable examples of dual functionals in approximation theory and computer-aided geometric design are the blossom and the divided difference operator. Both of these dual functionals satisfy a similar set of formulas and identities. Moreover, the divided differences of polynomials can be expressed in terms of the blossom. In this paper, an extended non-polynomial homogeneous blossom for a wide collection of spline spaces, including trigonometric splines, hyperbolic splines, and special Müntz spaces of splines, is defined. It is shown that there is a relation between the non-polynomial divided difference and the blossom, which is analogous to the polynomial case.

AI.tldr: 本文定义了扩展的非多项式齐次开花函数，用于三角样条、双曲样条和特殊Müntz样条空间，并建立了非多项式差商与开花函数之间的关系，类似于多项式情况。
AI.motivation: 近似理论和计算机辅助几何设计中的两个重要对偶泛函——开花函数和差商算子具有相似的公式和恒等式，且多项式的差商可以用开花函数表示。本文旨在将这种关系推广到更广泛的非多项式样条空间。
AI.method: 定义了扩展的非多项式齐次开花函数，适用于三角样条、双曲样条和特殊Müntz样条空间。通过数学推导建立了非多项式差商与开花函数之间的关系。
AI.result: 成功建立了非多项式差商与开花函数之间的类比关系，将多项式情况下的结果推广到了更广泛的非多项式样条空间。
AI.conclusion: 本文扩展了开花函数的概念，证明了在非多项式样条空间中，差商与开花函数之间仍然存在类似于多项式情况的关系，为相关理论提供了统一的框架。

title: Sparsification of sums with respect to convex cones
summary:
Let $x_1,x_2,\ldots,x_m$ be elements of a convex cone $K$ such that their sum, $e$, is in the relative interior of $K$. An $ε$-sparsification of the sum involves taking a subset of the $x_i$ and reweighting them by positive scalars, so that the resulting sum is $ε$-close to $e$, where error is measured in a relative sense with respect to the order induced by $K$. This generalizes the influential spectral sparsification model for sums of positive semidefinite matrices.
  This paper introduces and studies the sparsification function of a convex cone, which measures, in the worst case over all possible sums from the cone, the smallest size of an $ε$-sparsifier. The linear-sized spectral sparsification theorem of Batson, Spielman, and Srivastava can be viewed as a bound on the sparsification function of the cone of positive semidefinite matrices. This result is generalized to a family of convex cones (including all hyperbolicity cones) that admit a $ν$-logarithmically homogeneous self-concordant barrier with certain additional properties. For these cones, the sparsification function is bounded above by $\lceil4ν/ε^2\rceil$. For general convex cones that only admit an ordinary $ν$-logarithmically homogeneous self-concordant barrier, the sparsification function is bounded above by $\lceil(4ν/ε)^2\rceil$. Furthermore, the paper explores how sparsification functions interact with various convex geometric operations (such as conic lifts), and describes implications of sparsification with respect to cones for certain conic optimization problems.

AI.tldr: 该论文将谱稀疏化推广到一般凸锥，定义了稀疏化函数来度量最坏情况下ε-稀疏化所需的最小尺寸，并给出了基于对数齐次自协调障碍的稀疏化函数上界。
AI.motivation: 将谱稀疏化从正半定矩阵锥推广到一般凸锥，研究凸锥的稀疏化能力，为更广泛的优化问题提供稀疏化工具。
AI.method: 引入凸锥的稀疏化函数概念，利用对数齐次自协调障碍理论，对满足特定条件的凸锥（包括所有双曲锥）建立稀疏化函数的上界。
AI.result: 对于具有ν-对数齐次自协调障碍且满足额外性质的凸锥，稀疏化函数上界为⌈4ν/ε²⌉；对于仅具有普通ν-对数齐次自协调障碍的凸锥，上界为⌈(4ν/ε)²⌉。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了凸锥稀疏化的一般理论框架，将谱稀疏化推广到更广泛的锥类，并探讨了稀疏化函数与凸几何运算的相互作用及其在锥优化问题中的应用。

title: On sufficient conditions in the classical problem of the calculus of variations
comment: Dear Colleagues, We sent you tex file of our manuscript for possible publication in arxiv.org. With best regards, Misir J.Mardanov
summary: This article is devoted to obtain new sufficient conditions for an extremum in problems of classical calculus of variations. The concept of a set of integrands is introduced. Using this concept, first and second order sufficient conditions for a weak and strong local minimum, as well as an absolute minimum were obtained. Also, this concept, in particular, allows us to define a class of variation problems for which the necessary Weierstrass condition is also sufficient condition. It is shown that the sufficient conditions for a minimum obtained here have new areas of application compared to the known sufficient conditions of the classical calculus of variations. The effectiveness of the obtained results is illustrated by examples.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入"被积函数集"概念，为变分法问题建立了新的极值充分条件，包括弱/强局部极小值和绝对极小值，并定义了Weierstrass必要条件同时为充分条件的问题类别。
AI.motivation: 经典变分法中现有的充分条件存在应用局限性，需要发展新的理论框架来扩展充分条件的适用范围，为更多变分问题提供极值判据。
AI.method: 引入"被积函数集"的新概念，基于此概念推导出一阶和二阶充分条件，分别针对弱局部极小值、强局部极小值和绝对极小值，并建立Weierstrass必要条件同时为充分条件的特殊问题类别。
AI.result: 获得了新的充分条件，这些条件相比经典变分法的已知充分条件具有更广泛的应用范围，通过具体示例验证了所获结果的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 提出的"被积函数集"概念为变分法极值问题提供了新的理论框架，扩展了充分条件的应用领域，在特定问题类别中实现了Weierstrass必要条件和充分条件的统一。

title: On Convergence of Regularized Barzilai-Borwein Method
summary: The regularized Barzilai-Borwein (RBB) method represents a promising gradient-based optimization algorithm. In this paper, by splitting the gradient into two parts and analyzing the dynamical system of difference equations governing the ratio of their magnitudes, we establish that the RBB method achieves R-linear convergence for strongly convex quadratic functions of arbitrary dimensions. Specifically, for the two-dimensional case, we provide a concise proof demonstrating that the method exhibits at least R-linear convergence. We propose a simple yet effective adaptive regularization parameter scheme to further improve its performance. A typical numerical example verifies the effectiveness of this scheme.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了正则化Barzilai-Borwein（RBB）方法对于任意维度的强凸二次函数具有R线性收敛性，并提出了自适应正则化参数方案来提升性能。
AI.motivation: 正则化Barzilai-Borwein（RBB）方法是一种有前景的基于梯度的优化算法，但其收敛性分析尚不完善。本文旨在建立RBB方法在强凸二次函数上的收敛理论，并提出改进方案。
AI.method: 通过将梯度分解为两部分，分析控制其幅度比的差分方程动力系统，建立了RBB方法的收敛理论。针对二维情况提供了简洁的收敛性证明，并提出了一种简单有效的自适应正则化参数方案。
AI.result: 证明了RBB方法对于任意维度的强凸二次函数具有R线性收敛性。对于二维情况，提供了至少R线性收敛的证明。提出的自适应正则化参数方案通过典型数值例子验证了其有效性。
AI.conclusion: RBB方法在强凸二次优化问题上具有理论保证的收敛性，提出的自适应正则化参数方案能进一步提升算法性能，为梯度优化算法提供了新的理论支持。

title: Time-integrated Optimal Transport: A Robust Minimax Framework
summary: Comparing time series in a principled manner requires capturing both temporal alignment and distributional similarity of features. Optimal transport (OT) has recently emerged as a powerful tool for this task, but existing OT-based approaches often depend on manually selected balancing parameters and can be computationally intensive. In this work, we introduce the Time-integrated Optimal Transport (TiOT) framework, which integrates temporal and feature components into a unified objective and yields a well-defined metric on the space of probability measures. This metric preserves fundamental properties of the Wasserstein distance, while avoiding the need for parameter tuning. To address the corresponding computational challenges, we introduce an entropic regularized approximation of TiOT, which can be efficiently solved using a block coordinate descent algorithm. Extensive experiments on both synthetic and real-world time series datasets demonstrate that our approach achieves improved accuracy and stability while maintaining comparable efficiency.

AI.tldr: 提出TiOT框架，将时间对齐和特征分布相似性统一到一个目标中，形成概率测度空间上的度量，无需参数调优，并通过熵正则化实现高效计算。
AI.motivation: 现有基于最优传输的时间序列比较方法通常需要手动选择平衡参数，且计算成本高，需要一种既能捕捉时间对齐又能考虑特征分布相似性的统一框架。
AI.method: 提出时间集成最优传输（TiOT）框架，将时间和特征组件集成到统一目标中，形成概率测度空间上的度量。引入熵正则化近似，使用块坐标下降算法高效求解。
AI.result: 在合成和真实世界时间序列数据集上的实验表明，该方法在保持可比效率的同时，实现了更高的准确性和稳定性。
AI.conclusion: TiOT框架为时间序列比较提供了一个统一、无需参数调优的度量方法，在保持Wasserstein距离基本性质的同时，通过高效算法解决了计算挑战。

title: Mean-Field Analysis and Optimal Control of a Dynamic Rating and Matchmaking System
summary: Large-scale competitive platforms are interacting multi-agent systems in which latent skills drift over time and pairwise interactions are shaped by matchmaking. We study a controlled rating dynamics in the mean-field limit and derive a kinetic description for the joint evolution of skills and ratings. In the Gaussian regime, we prove an exact moment closure and obtain a low-dimensional deterministic state dynamics for rating accuracy. This yields three main insights. First, skill drift imposes an intrinsic ceiling on long-run accuracy (the ``Red Queen'' effect). Second, with period-by-period scale control, the information content of interactions satisfies an invariance principle: under signal-matched scaling, the one-step accuracy transition is independent of matchmaking intensity. Third, the optimal platform policy separates: filtering is implemented by a greedy choice of the gain and rating scale, while matchmaking reduces to a static trade-off between match utility and sorting costs.

AI.tldr: 研究大规模竞争平台中的技能与评分动态演化，在均值场极限下推导动力学描述，证明高斯机制下的精确矩闭包，揭示技能漂移对长期精度的限制、信息内容的不变性原理，以及平台最优策略的分离特性。
AI.motivation: 大规模竞争平台是交互多智能体系统，其中潜在技能随时间漂移，配对交互受匹配机制影响。需要理解技能和评分的联合演化动态，以及平台如何通过控制策略优化系统性能。
AI.method: 在均值场极限下推导受控评分动态的动力学描述；在高斯机制下证明精确矩闭包，获得评分精度的低维确定性状态动态；分析不同控制策略下的系统行为。
AI.result: 1) 技能漂移对长期精度施加内在上限（"红皇后"效应）；2) 在逐期尺度控制下，交互的信息内容满足不变性原理：在信号匹配尺度下，单步精度转移独立于匹配强度；3) 最优平台策略可分离：滤波通过贪婪选择增益和评分尺度实现，匹配简化为匹配效用与排序成本之间的静态权衡。
AI.conclusion: 大规模竞争平台中的技能-评分动态具有明确的数学结构，揭示了系统性能的基本限制和最优控制策略的分离特性，为平台设计提供了理论指导。
